title: Scripps Center for Integrative Medicine - Address and Hours
description: Find directions and phone number for our specialty center that offers complementary and integrative medicine, acupuncture, biofeedback, yoga and meditation.
cleaned_text: Scripps Center for Integrative Medicine - Main Phone - [858-554-3300](tel:+18585543300) - Hours Mon - Fri: 8 am - 5 pm - Main Phone - [858-554-3300](tel:+18585543300) - Imaging - [858-554-7844](tel:+18585547844) - Hours Mon - Fri: 8 am - 5 pm - Parking Free parking with membership. Paid parking is also available. The first 30 minutes is free and then up to four hours cost $5. - Imaging - Wi-Fi - Meditation labyrinth - Fitness center - Healing garden - Paid parking (cash and credit) Scripps specialty center in La Jolla offers holistic and integrative medicine services Located next door to [Scripps Clinic Torrey Pines](/locations/scripps-clinic/scripps-clinic-torrey-pines), between I-5 and Torrey Pines State Park, Scripps Center for Integrative Medicine offers the best of conventional and complementary medicine. Services Our services incorporate a variety of healing traditions, and include: - Acupuncture - Advanced lipid testing - Body-mind classes - Biofeedback - Cardiac rehabilitation - Electrostimulation therapy - Enhanced external counterpulsation (EECP) [Fitness center](/locations/specialty-centers/scripps-shiley-pavilion/shiley-sports-and-fitness-center) - Guided imagery - Healing touch - Imaging and early detection - Integrative cancer care - Integrative cardiology - Lifestyle change program - Mindfulness-based stress reduction - Natural supplement consultation - Nutrition consultation - Pain management - Weight management - Yoga and meditation Parking information Paid parking is available on-site in our gated lot. Our rates are as follows: - First 30 minutes: Free - 31 minutes to 4 hours: $5 - 4 hours to all day: $10 - Maximum per day: $10 Parking for [Shiley Sports and Fitness Center](/locations/specialty-centers/scripps-shiley-pavilion/shiley-sports-and-fitness-center) members, disabled visitors and expectant mothers is free: - Visitors with disabilities can receive validation from a valet attendant - Expectant mothers can receive validation from the medical office they visit - Shiley Sports and Fitness Center members can receive validation at the fitness center
